allOf.description: Start allocating ports at this value, going downward

database-list.description: Databases to create and respective user credentials getting all privileges on it

test-database-amount.description: The number of test databases to create, adding auto-generated entries to database-list

full-retention-days.description: How many days full backups must be retained, -1 meaning full backups are disabled and 0 meaning no expiration

incremental-retention-days.description: How many days incremental backups (binlogs) must be retained, -1 meaning incremental backups are disabled and 0 meaning no expiration, defaulting to full-retention-days' value

backup-periodicity.description: When to backup, specified in the same format as for systemd.time(7) calendar events (years & seconds not supported, DoW & DoM can not be combined).

long-query-time.description: Number of seconds above which long queries are logged

relaxed-writes.description: When enabled, sets innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit = 0, innodb_flush_method = nosync, innodb_doublewrite = 0 and sync_frm = 0 - RTFM, those options are dangerous

ssl.description: Enable and define SSL support for network connections

caucase-url.title: Caucase URL
caucase-url.description: URL of caucase service to use. If not set, global setting will be used.

max-crl-update-delay.title: Periodicity of CRL update (days)
max-crl-update-delay.description: CRL will be updated from caucase as least this often.
